00037 enum uvm_ml_stream_kind_e
00038 {
00039     UVM_ML_STREAM_NULL = 0,
00040     UVM_ML_STREAM_TYPED_OBJECT,
00041     UVM_ML_STREAM_RAW,
00042     UVM_ML_STREAM_STRING
00043 };

00045 bp_api_struct         * uvm_ml_config_handler::m_bp_provided_api = NULL;
00046 uvm_ml_config_handler * uvm_ml_config_rsrc::m_config_handler     = NULL;

00062 uvm_ml_config_handler::uvm_ml_config_handler(sc_core::sc_module_name nm, bp_api_struct * bp_provided_api) :
00063     uvm_component(nm)
00064 {
00065     m_bp_provided_api = bp_provided_api;
00066     uvm_register_config_callback(this);
00067     uvm_register_rsrc_callback(this);
00068 }

00074 uvm_ml_config_handler::~uvm_ml_config_handler()
00075 {
00076     uvm_unregister_config_callback(this);
00077 }

00088 void uvm_ml_config_handler::config_callback(std::string cntxt, std::string inst_name, std::string field_name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc)
00089 {
00090     process_frmw_notification(UVM_CONFIG_SET, inst_name, field_name, rsrc, cntxt);
00091 }   // config_callback
00092 
00093 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 
00102 void uvm_ml_config_handler::rsrc_callback(uvm_rsrc_action action, std::string scope, std::string name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc)
00103 {
00104     process_frmw_notification(action, scope, name, rsrc);
00105 }   // rsrc_callback
00106 
00107 void uvm_ml_config_handler::process_frmw_notification(uvm_rsrc_action action, std::string scope, std::string name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc, std::string cntxt)
00108 {
00109     uvm_resource<string>              * rsrc_str;
00110     uvm_resource<uvm_object *>        * rsrc_obj;
00111     uvm_resource<sc_dt::sc_bv_base >  * rsrc_int;
00112     std::string                         str_val;
00113     uvm_object *                        obj_val;
00114     int                                 nbits;
00115     //sc_dt::sc_bv<4096>                  bv_val;
00116 
00117     if (bp_set_config)
00118     {
00119         bp_set_config = false;
00120         return;
00121     }
00122 
00123     //if (uvm_ml_in_export_notify_resource != 0) // VY: Do not send back the notification received from the backplane
00124     //return;
00125     uvm_ml_packed_obj & packed_obj = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00126     sc_core::sc_time current_time  = sc_core::sc_time_stamp();
00127     double           time_sec      = current_time.to_seconds();
00128     unsigned         framework_id  = uvm_ml_utils::FrameworkId();
00129     uvm_ml_packer_int packer;
00130 
00131     if (rsrc->get_value_type_id() == typeid(std::string))
00132     {
00133         rsrc_str = DCAST<uvm_resource<string> *>(rsrc);
00134         if (rsrc_str == NULL)
00135         {
00136             cout << "ERROR: config_callback DCAST to string is NULL, should never happen!!" << endl;
00137         }
00138         else
00139         {
00140             str_val = rsrc_str->read();
00141             packer << UVM_ML_STREAM_STRING;
00142             packer << str_val;
00143             packer.fill_uvm_ml_packed_obj(&packed_obj);
00144 
00145 
00146             if (UVM_CONFIG_SET)
00147                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_config_ptr)(framework_id, cntxt.c_str(), scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00148             else
00149                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_resource_ptr)(framework_id, (uvm_ml_resource_notify_action) action, scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), scope.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00150 
00151         }
00152     }
00153     else if (rsrc->get_value_type_id() == typeid(uvm_object*))
00154     {
00155         rsrc_obj = DCAST<uvm_resource<uvm_object *> *>(rsrc);
00156         if (rsrc_obj == NULL)
00157         {
00158             cout << "ERROR: config_callback DCAST to uvm_object * is NULL, should never happen!!" << endl;
00159         }
00160         else
00161         {
00162             obj_val = rsrc_obj->read();
00163             uvm_ml_packer_pack(obj_val, &packed_obj);
00164 
00165             if (UVM_CONFIG_SET)
00166                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_config_ptr)(framework_id, cntxt.c_str(), scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00167             else
00168                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_resource_ptr)(framework_id, (uvm_ml_resource_notify_action) action, scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), scope.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00169 
00170         }
00171     }
00172     else if (rsrc->get_value_type_id() == typeid(sc_dt::sc_bv_base))
00173     {
00174         rsrc_int = DCAST<uvm_resource<sc_dt::sc_bv_base > *>(rsrc);
00175         if (rsrc_int == NULL)
00176         {
00177             cout << "ERROR: config_callback DCAST to sc_dt::sc_bv * is NULL, should never happen!!" << endl;
00178         }
00179         else
00180         {
00181             nbits = rsrc_int->get_nbits();
00182 
00183             sc_dt::sc_bv_base bv_val(nbits);
00184             bv_val = rsrc_int->read();
00185             packer << UVM_ML_STREAM_RAW;
00186             packer << bv_val;
00187             packer.fill_uvm_ml_packed_obj(&packed_obj);
00188 
00189             if (UVM_CONFIG_SET)
00190                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_config_ptr)(framework_id, cntxt.c_str(), scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00191             else
00192                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_resource_ptr)(framework_id, (uvm_ml_resource_notify_action) action, scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), scope.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00193         }
00194     }
00195 
00196 }   // process_frmw_notification

00203 void uvm_ml_config_rsrc::Initialize(bp_api_struct *bp_provided_api)
00204 {
00205     m_config_handler = new uvm_ml_config_handler("Config_Handler", bp_provided_api);
00206 
00207 }   // Initialize()

00212 
00221 void uvm_ml_config_rsrc::notify_config
00222 (
00223     const char *     cntxt,
00224     const char *     instance_name,
00225     const char *     field_name,
00226     unsigned int     stream_size,
00227     uvm_ml_stream_t  stream,
00228     uvm_ml_time_unit time_unit,
00229     double           time_value
00230 )
00231 {
00232     ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00233     process_bp_notification(UVM_ML_CONFIG_SET, instance_name, field_name, stream_size, stream, time_unit, time_value, cntxt); 
00234     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00235 
00236 }   // notify_config
00237 
00238 int uvm_ml_config_rsrc::notify_resource
00239 (
00240     uvm_ml_resource_notify_action action,
00241     const char *                  item_scope,
00242     const char *                  item_name,
00243     const char *                  accessor_name,
00244     unsigned int                  stream_size,
00245     uvm_ml_stream_t               stream,
00246     uvm_ml_time_unit              time_unit,
00247     double                        time_value
00248 )
00249 {
00250     ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00251     string cntxt = "";
00252     process_bp_notification(action, item_scope, item_name, stream_size, stream, time_unit, time_value); 
00253     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00254     return 1;
00255 
00256 }   // notify_resource
00257 
00258 void uvm_ml_config_rsrc::process_bp_notification
00259 (
00260     uvm_ml_resource_notify_action action,
00261     const char *                  item_scope,
00262     const char *                  item_name,
00263     unsigned int                  stream_size,
00264     uvm_ml_stream_t               stream,
00265     uvm_ml_time_unit              time_unit,
00266     double                        time_value,
00267     const char *                  cntxt
00268 )
00269 {
00270     unsigned int         data_size = stream_size - UVM_ML_BLOCK_SIZE;
00271     std::string          str_val;
00272     uvm_object *         obj_val;
00273     sc_dt::sc_bv_base    bv_val((int) data_size);
00274     std::vector<unsigned> vec;
00275     uvm_ml_packer_int  packer;
00276 
00277     bp_set_config = true;
00278     uvm_ml_stream_t stream_data = stream;
00279 
00280     uvm_ml_packed_obj&  packed_obj = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00281 
00282     switch (stream[0])
00283     {
00284     case UVM_ML_STREAM_STRING:
00285         stream_data++;
00286         uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(packed_obj, data_size, stream_data);
00287         packer.set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(&packed_obj);
00288         packer >> str_val;
00289         call_db(action, cntxt, item_scope, item_name, str_val);
00290         break;
00291 
00292     case UVM_ML_STREAM_TYPED_OBJECT:
00293       { uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(packed_obj, stream_size, stream);
00294         packer.set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(&packed_obj);
00295         if (packer.check_obj_header()) { // Else silently drop it (until tracing is not added) - probably not intended for SC
00296            packer >> obj_val;
00297            call_db(action, cntxt, item_scope, item_name, obj_val);
00298         }
00299         break;
00300       }
00301     case UVM_ML_STREAM_RAW:
00302         stream_data++;
00303         uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(packed_obj, data_size, stream_data);
00304         packer.set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(&packed_obj);
00305         packer >> bv_val;
00306         call_db(action, cntxt, item_scope, item_name, bv_val);
00307         break;
00308 
00309     default:
00310         break;
00311     };
00312 
00313 }   // process_bp_notification()
